technicalValidationMessages.ns2:message: Request body contains on line: [1] and column: [123] error: [cvc-elt.1.a: Cannot find the declaration of element 'TokenExchangeRequest'.]

Request body contains on line: [1] and column: [123] error: [unexpected element (uri:"http://schemas.nav.gov.hu/OSA/2.0/api", local:"TokenExchangeRequest").
